title: What [Post-Work] Will Look Like in the Future
author: AbolishWork

title: I feel like a huge reason behind ADHD denialism is that people want to believe nonworkers are just lazy and bad people
body:
People don't face the reality that due to a neurodivergence, a person can't work. They want to believe it is a choice, or that it isn't a barrier to work. They want to force everyone to work and ADHD, especially treatment-resistant ADHD, is a threat to the social order. People don't care about mental health if it disrupts their obsession with forcing everyone to work.

Capitalism and ableism are interlocked oppressions.
author: [deleted]

title: Technology and Idle Creativity are Not Mutually Exclusive
author: AbolishWork
